```{r echo=TRUE, results='hide', error=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r include=FALSE}
data.path.raw = "C:/Users/HOME PC/Desktop/current_fit_raw.csv"
data.path.folds = "C:/Users/HOME PC/Desktop/current_fit.csv"
```

```{r}
df.folds = read.csv(data.path.folds)
df.raw = read.csv(data.path.raw)
colnames(df.folds)[1] = "TIME"
colnames(df.raw)[1] = "TIME"
```

```{r}
head(df.raw)
```

```{r}
head(df.folds)
```

```{r}
df.raw %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = c(-TIME), names_to="SUBSTRATE", values_to="CONCENTRATIONS") %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=TIME, y=CONCENTRATIONS, color=SUBSTRATE)) +
  geom_line()
```
